https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mZ6MxyyOy5ZgpVEjGH6b3eaiQnF.jpg Buddha's Lost Children is a feature-length documentary film about a Thai Buddhist monk who, armed only with his master boxing skills, wages an inspirational battle to help orphaned children, fight drug abuse, and preserve a vanishing way of life. Buddha's Lost Children
